name: Polynome
body:
Polynome is a consulting firm providing rapid, high-quality design and implementation for your software projects. Our expertise ranges from mobile and web applications to server software, queues, distributed systems, and databases. Our team has experience building applications for Microsoft and Amazon / AWS as well as for numerous successful startups.

Contact us at [partners@polynome.co](mailto:partners@polynome.co) to learn how we can help you deliver your next software project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
